modName: All Follower Voice Types with Greetings
summary: Now you can recruit anyone you see in Skyrim! Make anyone a follower!
descriptionHtml:
=========
Why Install?
==========
The vanilla Skyrim has only a few voice types that are compatible to be a follower.
With this mod, all voice types can be recruited as follower. Now you can recruit any Whiterun Guard or use the Populated Lands mod and recruit random travelers!
I also included BAT files which lessen the hassle and the follower autoheal too.

============
Compatibility
=============
I added more voice types through Creation kit but for some reason it doesn't work with UFO.

FIXED- I added a followufo bat command so it can work with UFO. Only use that if you have Ultimate Follower Overhaul, otherwise use the follow bat command.
=============
Installation
=============
Place into your Data folder all files.
Enable the esp.

=====================
What are the txt files?
=====================
They are simple bat commands that can be used in game to make someone a follower.

===============================
Q: How to make someone a follower?
================================
A: Simply, open up the console using the tilde key (~).

Click on the desired NPC, make sure its clicked by double clicking on it.

Type "bat follow" without the parentheses to make someone a follower, use the "bat followufo" if you have ultimate follower overhaul or if the person says you already have someone with you.

If you don't like them anymore, and wish to give back their old jobs/scripts, simply dismiss them and use "bat unfollow" on them.

=====================
Advantages of this mod
=====================
Every NPC you use the bat commands on will now Auto Heal outside of combat, which is my mod NPC Auto Heal, I combined with the .ESP

I also left the greetings so they wouldn't be COMPLETELY silent. And I left everything else, so they would react to environment and if someone is dead and so on.

=========================================================
Q: Help, my follower is not helping me fight, he is standing there.
=========================================================
A: Do not worry, this happened to me too, just wait for a minute or so, and the follower scripts should kick in, I recommend going inside an interior or saving game and loading it.
author: jedijosh920
